Name: TEST RE
About the game: ■Game Overview Set in a spooky lodge or laboratory. And use pistols, rifles, rocket launchers and other weapons to fight monsters and escape. This is a horror adventure FPS (first person perspective). ■History Two years ago, a large-scale bio-terrorist attack took place in a certain city. This bio-terrorism killed more than 170,000 people The whole world was shocked by the world's worst bio-terrorist attack... The protagonist miraculously survived the bio-terrorist attack. He started to search for the truth about bioterrorism under the status of a journalist, based on his experience... Two years passed. Then one day he received a phone call. The call was to reveal the virus used in the bioterrorist attack two years ago... Suspicious, the protagonist goes to the abandoned house where he is asked to go... ■Full support of 4K HDR QuietMansion Remake features full support of 4K HDR Compatibility with 16bit HDR implements a gorgeous presentation that goes beyond usual HDR Enjoy a different dimension of graphics! ■An evolved image production Thanks to the success of crowd funding the developer was able to obtain a high-end PC 'Heavy productions and effects that could not be used until now' can now be used freely An overwhelming image beauty has been realised ■An evolved sound system Real Sound Effect(RSE) was experimentally introduced to previous works, and received extraordinarily high ratings Now it's evolved to Enhance Real Sound Effect(ERSE) Horror productions that featured 3D Space Audio were able to be transformed into completely new horror experiences Title TEST RE Genre First-Person Horror Adventure Age Target None (in the future CERO rating planned) Distribution Permission Full (This game may be streamed individually or commercially) Translator:Richard Lenerz Special Thanks:Tobias Nitsch & Steve Russell
